scripts.build:css-app: node-sass --include-path scss assets/scss/app.scss assets/css/app.css --source-map-embed true --output-style compressed
scripts.build:css-notice: node-sass --include-path scss assets/scss/notice.scss assets/css/notice.css --source-map-embed true --output-style compressed
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css-app && npm run build:css-notice
